snippet: Glenn Greenwald, a blogger who opposes government surveillance and has supported whistle-blowers, has published a top-secret order on the monitoring of phone logs.
abstract: Glenn Greenwald, lawyer and blogger who opposes government surveillance and has supported whistle-blowers, publishes article in British newspaper The Guardian about existence of top-secret court order allowing the National Security Agency to monitor millions of telephone logs.

byline.original: By NOAM COHEN and LESLIE KAUFMAN

lead_paragraph: Glenn Greenwald, a blogger who opposes government surveillance and has supported whistle-blowers, has published a top-secret order on the monitoring of phone logs.

headline.seo: Anti-Surveillance Activist Is at Center of New Leak
headline.main: Blogger, With Focus on Surveillance, Is at Center of a Debate
headline.print_headline: Blogger, With Focus on Surveillance, Is at Center of a Debate

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
